Question: This person followed suit, according to tradition killing herself by means of an asp bite on August 12, 30 BC.
Hints: Shakespeare re-introduced part of the image, this person clutching the snake to her breast.
Although **** was married to her young brother, she quickly made it clear that she had no intention of sharing power with him.
Caesar seized the Egyptian capital and imposed himself as arbiter between the rival claims of Ptolemy and this person.
